content.en: Optimal pricing: Researchers are using algorithms to determine the best assortment of products and their prices in order to maximize profit for retailers. These algorithms efficiently find the optimal assortment and prices that will generate the highest revenue. They are also being used to solve dynamic assortment optimization problems, taking into account contextual information and non-stationary choice models. Overall, algorithms are playing a crucial role in helping retailers make strategic decisions to increase their profits and customer satisfaction.
content.da: Optimal prissætning: Forskere anvender algoritmer til at bestemme det bedste udvalg af produkter og deres priser for at maksimere fortjenesten for detailhandlere. Disse algoritmer finder effektivt det optimale udvalg og priser, der vil generere den højeste indtægt. De bruges også til at løse dynamiske optimeringsproblemer for udvalg, idet de tager højde for kontekstuelle oplysninger og ikke-stationære valgmodeller. Overordnet spiller algoritmer en afgørende rolle i at hjælpe detailhandlere med at træffe strategiske beslutninger for at øge deres afkast og kundetilfredshed.
